long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you concerned about your consent choices when visiting your favourite website(s)?

Consent Right is a browser extension to provide granular control over removal of elements in a cookie consent banner which are responsible for storing positive consent to processing end-user's personal data.

To target the problematic part in the consent dialogues that violates the compliance with the GDPR. This tool helps its user to consciously register their consent to web-services they access.

Currently, the extension supports OneTrust & Quantcast based CMP and few minor providers. I am actively working on the list to keep it up-to-date for a frequent use.

I am releasing the initial tester release for the users to give their feedbacks on this.

Special Thanks to xd4rker, Harshvardhan J. Pandit & Dave Lewis
